returns._0: Nonce that should be used as part of ClaimableInvite.

params._issuer: Issuer to include in the ClaimableInvite.

returns._0: ClaimableInvite that can be hashed & signed.

params._chainid: Chain ID to use in the EIP712 domain.
params._name: Contract name to use in the EIP712 domain.
params._verifyingContract: Address to use in the EIP712 domain.
params._version: Contract version to use in the EIP712 domain.

CLAIMABLE_INVITE_TYPEHASH().notice: EIP712 typehash for the ClaimableInvite type.

EIP712_DOMAIN_TYPEHASH().notice: EIP712 typehash for the EIP712Domain type that is included as part of the signature.

consumeNonce().notice: Returns a bytes32 nonce that should change everytime. In practice, people should use         pseudorandom nonces.

currentNonce().notice: Keeps track of current nonce to generate new nonces for each invite.

getClaimableInviteStructHash((address,by.notice: Returns the hash of the struct ClaimableInvite.

getClaimableInviteWithNewNonce(address).notice: Returns a ClaimableInvite with the issuer and current nonce.

getDigest((address,bytes32)).notice: Computes the EIP712 digest with default correct parameters.

getDigestWithEIP712Domain((address,bytes.notice: Computes the EIP712 digest with the given domain parameters.         Used for testing that different domain parameters fail.

name().notice: OptimistInviter contract name. Used to construct the EIP-712 domain.

optimistInviter().notice: Address of OptimistInviter contract we are testing.

currentNonce().notice: Keeps track of current nonce to generate new nonces for each invite.

userdoc.notice: Simple helper contract that helps with testing flow and signature for         OptimistInviter contract. Made this a separate contract instead of including         in OptimistInviter.t.sol for reusability.

returns._0: Nonce that should be used as part of ClaimableInvite.

params._issuer: Issuer to include in the ClaimableInvite.

returns._0: ClaimableInvite that can be hashed & signed.

params._chainid: Chain ID to use in the EIP712 domain.
params._name: Contract name to use in the EIP712 domain.
params._verifyingContract: Address to use in the EIP712 domain.
params._version: Contract version to use in the EIP712 domain.
